ruleset.name: cougaar
ruleset.description: These rules are specific to Cougaar

rule.name: DontCreateThreadsRule
rule.message: Don't create threads, use the ThreadService instead
rule.description: Don't create Threads, use the Cougaar ThreadService instead.

rule.name: DontCreateTimersRule
rule.message: Don't create Timers, use the AlarmService instead
rule.description: Don't create Timers, use the AlarmService instead.

rule.name: DontUseSystemOut
rule.message: Don't use System.out/in/err, use the Cougaar logging service instead
rule.description: Don't use System.out/in/err, use the Cougaar logging service instead.
